articles.description: Ukraine's southern command said Monday that Ukraine had started "offensive actions" in a few areas, including the Kherson region.
articles.content:
President Volodymyr Zelenskyy told Russian forces to flee as Ukraine begins its counteroffensive, including in the southern region of Kherson.

articles.description: DHS investigators can no longer compel Ornato to cooperate in his testimony as a federal employee because he is now a private citizen.

articles.title: Serena Williams wins US Open match, delays goodbye to tennis
articles.description: Serena Williams' 6-3, 6-3 win over Danka Kovinić in the first round of the US Open extends her illustrious tennis career just a little bit longer.

articles.title: 13 times Taylor Swift has broken records
articles.description: Taylor Swift just broke the record for most video of the year wins at the 2022 VMAs, surpassing Eminem, Rihanna, and Beyoncé, who each have two wins.
